title: Football finally trumps Baseball in the Mastro Auction
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Football finally trumps Baseball in the Mastro Auction
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Carl Lamendola
I must say after collecting football for all these years, it was nice to see the 1894 Mayo football set bypass all the key baseball sets in the latest Mastro auction, T206, T205, 1952 Topps, E90-1,1933 Goudey.... They all struck out. Who would have thunk it?
